Key Match Events: Dennis Schroder and Cam Johnson each scored 20 points for the Nets
Dorian Finney-Smith hit a 3-pointer with 1:13 left to give the Nets a 5-point lead
Santi Aldama missed a 3-pointer as time expired for the Grizzlies
Miscellaneous Highlights: The game was the first time the Grizzlies played at Barclays Center since the 2021-22 season
Ja Morant wowed the crowd with a spin move for a layup late in the second quarter
Others: The Nets evened their record at 4-4
Jaren Jackson Jr. had 15 points for the Grizzlies
The Grizzlies had won their last two games
